mapper.select: SELECT COLLECTION_NO, COLLECTION_TITLE, CHANGE_NAME, m.NICK_NAME, c.MEMBER_NO FROM COLLECTION c JOIN MEMBER m ON c.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO WHERE c.STATUS = 'Y' AND m.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY COLLECTION_ENROLL

SELECT COLLECTION_NO, c.MEMBER_NO, COLLECTION_CONTENT, COLLECTION_TITLE, CHANGE_NAME, m.NICK_NAME FROM COLLECTION c JOIN MEMBER m ON c.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO WHERE m.STATUS = 'Y' AND c.STATUS = 'Y' AND c.COLLECTION_NO = #{ clno }
SELECT COLLECTION_NO collectionNo, MOVIE_TITLE movieTitle, MOVIE_YEAR movieYear FROM COLLECTION_MOVIE WHERE COLLECTION_NO = #{ clno } ORDER BY MOVIE_YEAR
